[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bge-core](./bge-core.md) &gt; [Zone](./bge-core.zone.md)

## Zone class

 Represents a rectangular region on the table, with an outline and optional label.  Child objects can be dynamically added or removed with `Zone.children`<!-- -->, or in a deriving class with `@display()` annotated properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Zone extends GameObject 
```
**Extends:** [GameObject](./bge-core.gameobject.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(width, height)](./bge-core.zone._constructor_.md) |  | Represents a rectangular region on the table, with an outline and optional label. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./bge-core.zone.children.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [DisplayContainer](./bge-core.displaycontainer.md) |  Contains child objects that are displayed inside this zone.  This will also contain objects from <code>@display()</code> annotated properties, using the property keys as names. |
|  [footprint](./bge-core.zone.footprint.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Footprint](./bge-core.footprint.md) |  |
|  [height](./bge-core.zone.height.md) |  | number | Height of the zone in centimeters. |
|  [label?](./bge-core.zone.label.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Optional label text to describe this zone to players. |
|  [outlineStyle](./bge-core.zone.outlinestyle.md) |  | [OutlineStyle](./bge-core.outlinestyle.md) | Appearance of the outline around this zone. |
|  [width](./bge-core.zone.width.md) |  | number | Width of the zone in centimeters. |
